ee, ehi sabhapathi winisuru wijith malalgoda pramukha winisuru madullak hamuweyi.ehidi pethsamkaruwan illa aththe manthriwariyage dhuraya ahimikarana rit aagnyawak nikuth karana lesayi.aya methek thama dwithwa purawasibhawaya iwath karagath bawata sanatha karana kisidu liyawillak idiripath kara nathayi pethsamkara parshawaya wenuwen peni siti nithignyawarun prakasha kara thibenawa.dwithwa purawasiyanta parlimenthu manthriwarun lesa katayuthu kala nohaki bawin eeta adala niyogayak labadena lesayi owun illa aththe.karunu salaka balu abhiyachanadhikaranaya wadidura nadu wibhagaya okthombar 24 wanadata kal thabuwa.

ayithiya pilibanda hegalge darshanayata wiwechanayak (1843-44), aarthika saha darshanika athapitapath (1844), febark pilibanda thisisayan (1845), darshanaye dugibawa (1847), watup sha‡∑äramaya saha pa‡∑äragdhanaya (1847 ) , pa‡∑äranshaye panthi aragalayan 1848-1850 (1850), luwi bonapatge 18 weni ba‡∑≤maraya (1852) deshapalana aarthikawidyawa pilibanda wiwechanayata dayakathwaya - handinwima (1857), athiriktha watinakama pilibanda niyamaya (1861) , pa‡∑äragdhanaya sha (1867), pa‡∑äranshaye siwil yuddhaya (1870-71), gotha wapiliwela pilibanda wiwechanaya (1875) saha pa‡∑äragdhanaya kruthiya sampurnakirima sandaha awashya satahan liwima .
